init.file: File | Set the compile file generate mode
init.file.mcfunction_generate_mode: Will generated mcfunction files cover the original ones, or append after them, or be opposite?
init.file.function_tag_generate_mode: Will generated function tag files cover the original ones, or append after them, or be opposite?
init.namespace: Namespace | Modify the default namespace of below entries, it will be filled in the commands which need namespace but you had left it default (minecraft)
init.scb_expression: ScoreBoard Expression | Modify the scoreboard objective name which will be used in scoreboard expression
init.scb_expression.temp_scb_objective_n: Set the temp scoreboard objective name which will be used in calculation
init.scb_expression.use_const_number_scb: Do you use the const number scoreboard objective? It will remember the const number you used in calculation and initialize them in the init.mcfunction
init.scb_expression.const_number_scb_obj: If you choose to use it, set the name here
init.function_statement: Function Statement | Modify the function statement settings
init.function_statement.flat_when_one_co: If there were just one command in the generated mcfunction file, do you want to flat it to be behind the execute command run part?(Noticed: when there were just one exec command in the function, the behavior was not equal to the one flatted)
init.function_statement.stack_namespace_: Set the storage stack namespace id the function used in remember information. Type like this: namespace:id
init.function_statement.common_io: Do you want all the function statement to use the same input and output storage area?
init.exist_expression: Exist Expression | Modify the exist expression settings
init.exist_expression.stack_namespace_id: Set the storage stack namespace id the exist expression used in remember information. Type like this: namespace:id
init.exist_expression.every_condition_ne: When compiling the exist expresion, do you want to use new function files, or just use execute if data
build.description: compile the datapack .mcf files into .mcfunction files
init.entity_name_map: JustMCF supports the map from entity name to uuid, which would be generated automatically or edited in the mcf.mcmeta file manually. The setting was skip.
build.source_path.as_source_path: Building need source path. Do you want to let the execute path as the source path?
build.target_path.new_source_path: Please input the output target path
build.target_path.as_target_path: Building need output target path. Do you want to let the execute path as the target path? (not commended)
build.pack_mcmeta: There was not a minecraft data pack in the source path!
init.finish: Init Finished! Have a good time!
build.mcf_mcmeta: There was not a JustMCF project in the source path. Do you want to init it?
init.inquirer_again: If you do not put in the source path or target path, should ask you again? If not, it will use default path.
init.choose.simple: Do you want to initialize the project with template?
conf.lang: choose your language and set whether it inquirer again
